page.title: 18HEALTH AND CARE IN REETH 2
page.content: {Old people's bungalows and flats:-} {Mrs Rowlands} is the warden of the centre and she is in charge of 42 people altogether,20 of them in the flats.She makes contact with everybody once a day to make sure they are alright.She is on call day and night except when she is having the day off.The flats are purpose built and have allthe modern amenities at the same time allowing the inhabitants as much privacy as they want.The activities available are whist, bingo,carpet bowls and television.{ {Mrs. Rowlands}enjoys the caring part of her job,although she does not like getting up in the middle of the night. {The Community Centre:-} The Centre has only been open a year and is sited in a building behind High Row.The Centre aims to provide a base for local people to meet for company & education
